appDesc.message: Support Independent YouTube channels - fight propaganda

popupTitleDescr.message: Reminds to "Like" and comment YouTube videos from recommended channels.

popupSchedule.message: Set a reminder to promote videos

popupPlaytypeLabel.message: "Open Tabs" button will open multiple tabs and play videos. To mute the sound, right click on the tab and select "Mute site"

popupManual2.message: 2. Like a video and leave a comment

popupManual3.message: 3. Watch a video at least 30 seconds and repeat, or run a playlist from the start after commenting videos.

notifyTopDescription.message:
Extension "Stop war - support free media on YouTube"
You can change notification time in the extension settings.

notifyTitle.message: Reminder:  run YouTube playlist, support independent media
